prog: (Haskell)(a005211_list, a242014_list) = unzip $ (1, 1) : f 1 1 where   f i x | y > x     = (y, i) : f (i + 1) y         | otherwise = f (i + 1) x         where y = a005210 i-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 11 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
